name: Off-Road Studios
description:
Off-Road Studios is a preeminent international multi-platform interactive advertising, communication design, multimedia, marketing, and technology agency, based out of Lahore, a city of 4000 years of history and a birthplace to the most creative minds. We create strong and provocative relationships between companies and their consumers by delivering strategy, coupled with skillful & creative transformation of ides into reality.
Our team of art directors, designers, animators and technologists strive on delivering breathtaking experiences for your consumers through creative solutions related to strategy & branding, print design, packaging, Illustration, websites, ATL & online advertising, applications and content management tools, 3d models, animation, HD video, photography and just about anything that takes advantage of digital technology.
